'''14w10c''' is the sixteenth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.8]], released on March 7, 2014,<ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20140314091137/https://mojang.com/2014/03/minecraft-snapshot-14w10a/|title=Minecraft snapshot 14w10c|author=[[Dinnerbone]]|website=Mojang.com}}</ref><ref>{{Tweet|Dinnerbone|441935359405223936|Minecraft snapshot 14w10c has been released to fix even more bugs from the previous snapshots. Read the changelog at https://mojang.com/2014/03/minecraft-snapshot-14w10a/|7 Mar 14}}</ref> to fix some of the bugs and crashes in the [[14w10a]] and [[14w10b]] snapshots.

14w10c was reuploaded an hour or so later to fix a server crash bug.<ref>{{Tweet|_grum|441956871537455104|Just ninja updated a little crashy bug in the server. Download it again if you have a crashy one; see: https://mojang.com/2014/03/minecraft-snapshot-14w10a/|7 Mar 14}}</ref>
